name: CUSTOM Comparison Table
liquid_code:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@9/swiper-bundle.min.css"/>

{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  
  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_letter = section.settings.heading_letter
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align

  assign table_columns = section.settings.table_columns
  assign table_mt = section.settings.table_mt
  assign table_column_gap = section.settings.table_column_gap
  assign table_row_gap = section.settings.table_row_gap
  assign table_row_gap_mobile = section.settings.table_row_gap_mobile
  assign table_item_bg_color = section.settings.table_item_bg_color
  assign table_item_bg_color_mobile = section.settings.table_item_bg_color_mobile
  assign table_item_padding_horizontal = section.settings.table_item_padding_horizontal
  assign table_item_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.table_item_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign table_item_padding_vertical = section.settings.table_item_padding_vertical
  assign table_item_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.table_item_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign table_item_radius = section.settings.table_item_radius
  assign table_use_link = section.settings.table_use_link

  assign column_image_max = section.settings.column_image_max
  assign column_image_max_mobile = section.settings.column_image_max_mobile
  
  assign column_heading_size = section.settings.column_heading_size
  assign column_heading_color = section.settings.column_heading_color
  assign column_heading_font = section.settings.column_heading_font
  assign column_heading_height = section.settings.column_heading_height
  assign column_heading_letter = section.settings.column_heading_letter
  assign column_heading_mt = section.settings.column_heading_mt

  assign column_text_size = section.settings.column_text_size
  assign column_text_color = section.settings.column_text_color
  assign column_text_font = section.settings.column_text_font
  assign column_text_height = section.settings.column_text_height
  assign column_text_letter = section.settings.column_text_letter
  assign column_text_mt = section.settings.column_text_mt

  assign column_link_size = section.settings.column_link_size
  assign column_link_color = section.settings.column_link_color
  assign column_link_hover_color = section.settings.column_link_hover_color
  assign column_link_bg_color = section.settings.column_link_bg_color
  assign column_link_bg_hover_color = section.settings.column_link_bg_hover_color
  assign column_link_font = section.settings.column_link_font
  assign column_link_height = section.settings.column_link_height
  assign column_link_letter = section.settings.column_link_letter
  assign column_link_padding_horizontal = section.settings.column_link_padding_horizontal
  assign column_link_padding_vertical = section.settings.column_link_padding_vertical
  assign column_link_radius = section.settings.column_link_radius
  assign column_link_style = section.settings.column_link_style

  assign row_heading_size = section.settings.row_heading_size
  assign row_heading_color = section.settings.row_heading_color
  assign row_heading_color_mobile = section.settings.row_heading_color_mobile
  assign row_heading_bg_color_mobile = section.settings.row_heading_bg_color_mobile
  assign row_heading_font = section.settings.row_heading_font
  assign row_heading_height = section.settings.row_heading_height
  assign row_heading_letter = section.settings.row_heading_letter
  assign row_heading_align = section.settings.row_heading_align
  assign row_heading_direction = section.settings.row_heading_direction
  assign row_heading_direction_mobile = section.settings.row_heading_direction_mobile
  assign row_heading_image_max = section.settings.row_heading_image_max
  assign row_heading_image_max_mobile = section.settings.row_heading_image_max_mobile

  assign row_text_size = section.settings.row_text_size
  assign row_text_color = section.settings.row_text_color
  assign row_text_color_mobile = section.settings.row_text_color_mobile
  assign row_text_font = section.settings.row_text_font
  assign row_text_height = section.settings.row_text_height
  assign row_text_letter = section.settings.row_text_letter
  assign row_text_mt = section.settings.row_text_mt

  assign row_padding_top = section.settings.row_padding_top
  assign row_padding_horizontal = section.settings.row_padding_horizontal
  assign row_border_color = section.settings.row_border_color
  assign row_border_thickness = section.settings.row_border_thickness
  assign row_image_max = section.settings.row_image_max
  assign row_image_max_mobile = section.settings.row_image_max_mobile

  assign first_column_image = section.settings.first_column_image
  assign first_column_heading = section.settings.first_column_heading
  assign first_column_text = section.settings.first_column_text
  assign first_column_link = section.settings.first_column_link
  assign first_column_link_url = section.settings.first_column_link_url

  assign second_column_image = section.settings.second_column_image
  assign second_column_heading = section.settings.second_column_heading
  assign second_column_text = section.settings.second_column_text
  assign second_column_link = section.settings.second_column_link
  assign second_column_link_url = section.settings.second_column_link_url

  assign third_column_image = section.settings.third_column_image
  assign third_column_heading = section.settings.third_column_heading
  assign third_column_text = section.settings.third_column_text
  assign third_column_link = section.settings.third_column_link
  assign third_column_link_url = section.settings.third_column_link_url

  assign fourth_column_image = section.settings.fourth_column_image
  assign fourth_column_heading = section.settings.fourth_column_heading
  assign fourth_column_text = section.settings.fourth_column_text
  assign fourth_column_link = section.settings.fourth_column_link
  assign fourth_column_link_url = section.settings.fourth_column_link_url

  assign btn_bg_color = section.settings.btn_bg_color
  
  assign slider_arrows_use = section.settings.slider_arrows_use

  if table_columns == 1
    assign grid_columns = '1fr 2fr'
  elsif table_columns == 2
    assign grid_columns = '1fr 2fr 2fr'
  elsif table_columns == 3
    assign grid_columns = '1fr 2fr 2fr 2fr'
  else
    assign grid_columns = '1fr 2fr 2fr 2fr 2fr'
  endif
  
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ column_link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ row_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ row_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .table-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ heading_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ heading_align }};
  }

  .table-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .table-items-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: {{ grid_columns }};
    grid-template-rows: 1fr;
  }
  
  .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ table_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding: {{ row_padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ column_heading_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ column_heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_heading_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_heading_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ column_text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ column_text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_text_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_text_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
  }
  
  .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ table_row_gap_mobile }}px;
    padding: {{ row_padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    border-top: {{ row_border_thickness }}px solid {{ row_border_color }};
  }
  
  .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} .table-item-{{ section.id }} {
    background-color: {{ table_item_bg_color_mobile }};
    padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ table_item_radius }}px;
  }

  .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ row_heading_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ row_heading_color_mobile }};
    line-height: {{ row_heading_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ row_heading_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ row_heading_align }};
  }

  .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ row_text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    font-size: {{ row_text_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ row_text_color_mobile }};
    line-height: {{ row_text_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ row_text_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_row_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      padding: {{ row_padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      border-top: {{ row_border_thickness }}px solid {{ row_border_color }};
  }

  .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ column_link_size | times: 0.85 }}px;
    color: {{ column_link_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_link_height }}%;
    letter-spacing: {{ column_link_letter }}px;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in 0s;
  }

  .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a:hover {
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in 0s;
    color: {{ column_link_hover_color }};
  }
  
  .table-item-{{ section.id }}:empty {
    display: block;
  }

  .table-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-top: {{ table_row_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .table-item-{{ section.id }}.row-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-direction: {{ row_heading_direction_mobile }};
    background-color: {{ row_heading_bg_color_mobile }};
    padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .column-image-{{ section.id }},
  .row-heading-image-{{ section.id }},
  .row-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .column-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .row-heading-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .row-image-{{ section.id }} img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: block;
    object-fit: contain;
  }

  .column-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ column_image_max_mobile }}px;
  }

  .row-heading-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ row_heading_image_max_mobile }}px;
  }
  
  .row-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ row_image_max_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: {{section.settings.row_heading_image_max_mobile | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px;
    z-index: 2;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: {{ btn_bg_color }};
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    display: block;
    object-fit: contain;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: #FFFFFF;
  }
  
  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 15px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 15px;
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg{
    transform: rotate(90deg);
  }
  
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg{
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
  }

  .comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.2;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 768px) {

    .table-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }

    .comparison-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid;
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_row_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    }
    
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} .table-item-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ table_item_bg_color }};
      padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
      color: {{ row_heading_color }};
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
      color: {{ row_text_color }};
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
      padding-bottom: {{ row_padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      border-bottom: {{ row_border_thickness }}px solid {{ row_border_color }};
    }

    .table-item-{{ section.id }}.row-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: {{ row_heading_direction }};
      background-color: {{ table_item_bg_color }};
      padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0  }}px;
    }

    .table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-top: 0;
      margin-left: {{ table_column_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    }
    
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }
    
    .table-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }
    
    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ row_padding_top }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
      margin-top: {{ column_heading_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ column_heading_size }}px;
      text-align:center;
    }

    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
      margin-top: {{ column_text_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ column_text_size }}px;
    }
    
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_row_gap }}px;
      padding: {{ row_padding_top }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
      padding-bottom: {{ row_padding_top }}px;
      border-bottom: {{ row_border_thickness }}px solid {{ row_border_color }};
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
      font-size: {{ row_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
      margin-top: {{ row_text_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ row_text_size }}px;
    }

    .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-top: {{ table_row_gap }}px;
        padding: {{ row_padding_top }}px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px 0px {{ row_padding_horizontal }}px;
        border-top: {{ row_border_thickness }}px solid {{ row_border_color }};
    }
    
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} .table-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }
    
    .table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ table_column_gap }}px;
    }

    .table-item-{{ section.id }}.row-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ table_item_padding_vertical }}px {{ table_item_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }
    
    .column-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ column_image_max }}px;
    }
    
    .row-heading-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ row_heading_image_max }}px;
    }
    
    .row-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ row_image_max }}px;
    }
    
  }
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if section.settings.heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .table-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
      font-family: {{ column_heading_font.family }}, {{ column_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ column_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .head-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
      font-family: {{ column_text_font.family }}, {{ column_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ column_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.column_link_custom %}
  <style>
    .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a {
      font-family: {{ column_link_font.family }}, {{ column_link_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ column_link_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_link_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.row_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} h2 {
      font-family: {{ row_heading_font.family }}, {{ row_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ row_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ row_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if section.settings.row_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }} p {
      font-family: {{ row_text_font.family }}, {{ row_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ row_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ row_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_use_link %}
  <style>
    
    .body-table-items-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
      border-bottom: none;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .body-table-items-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
        border-bottom: none;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_link_style == "button" %}
  <style>
    .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a {
      background-color: {{ column_link_bg_color }};
      padding: {{ column_link_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ column_link_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
      border-radius: {{ column_link_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a:hover {
      color: {{ column_link_hover_color }};
      background-color: {{ column_link_bg_hover_color }};
    }
    
    @media(min-width:768px) {
      .footer-table-items-{{ section.id }} a {
        padding: {{ column_link_padding_vertical }}px {{ column_link_padding_horizontal }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
  <div class="page-width section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
    
        {% if heading != blank %}
          <h2 class="table-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</h2>
        {% endif %}

        <div class="table-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="table-items-{{ section.id }} head-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}"></div>
            {% for item in (1..table_columns) %}
              <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if forloop.first %}
  
                  {% if first_column_image != blank %}
                    <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ first_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if first_column_heading != blank %}
                    <h2>{{ first_column_heading }}</h2>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if first_column_text != blank %}
                    <p>{{ first_column_text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                {% elsif forloop.index == 2 %}
  
                  {% if second_column_image != blank %}
                    <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ second_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if second_column_heading != blank %}
                    <h2>{{ second_column_heading }}</h2>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if second_column_text != blank %}
                    <p>{{ second_column_text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                {% elsif forloop.index == 3 %}
  
                  {% if third_column_image != blank %}
                    <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ third_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if third_column_heading != blank %}
                    <h2>{{ third_column_heading }}</h2>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if third_column_text != blank %}
                    <p>{{ third_column_text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                {% else %}
  
                  {% if fourth_column_image != blank %}
                    <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      <img src="{{ fourth_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if fourth_column_heading != blank %}
                    <h2>{{ fourth_column_heading }}</h2>
                  {% endif %}
  
                  {% if fourth_column_text != blank %}
                    <p>{{ fourth_column_text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
  
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <div class="table-items-{{ section.id }} body-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }} row-heading-{{ section.id }}">
  
                {% if block.settings.row_heading_image != blank %}
                  <div class="row-heading-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.row_heading_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_heading_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
            
                {% if block.settings.row_heading != blank %}
                  <h2>{{ block.settings.row_heading }}</h2>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              {% for item in (1..table_columns) %}
                <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if forloop.first %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.first_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.first_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.first_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ block.settings.first_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 2 %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.second_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.second_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.second_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ block.settings.second_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 3 %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.third_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.third_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.third_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ block.settings.third_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% else %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.fourth_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.fourth_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if block.settings.fourth_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ block.settings.fourth_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
          {% if table_use_link %}
            
            <div class="table-items-{{ section.id }} footer-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}"></div>
                {% for item in (1..table_columns) %}
                  <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if forloop.first %}
                      
                      {% if first_column_link != blank %}
                        <a href="{{ first_column_link_url }}">{{ first_column_link }}</a>
                      {% endif %}
                      
                    {% elsif forloop.index == 2 %}

                      {% if second_column_link != blank %}
                        <a href="{{ second_column_link_url }}">{{ second_column_link }}</a>
                      {% endif %}
                    
                    {% elsif forloop.index == 3 %}

                      {% if third_column_link != blank %}
                        <a href="{{ third_column_link_url }}">{{ third_column_link }}</a>
                      {% endif %}
                    
                    {% else %}

                      {% if fourth_column_link != blank %}
                        <a href="{{ fourth_column_link_url }}">{{ fourth_column_link }}</a>
                      {% endif %}
                    
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
            </div>
            
          {% endif %}
        </div>

        <div class="comparison-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for item in (1..table_columns) %}
              <div class="comparison-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="head-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if forloop.first %}
    
                    {% if first_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ first_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if first_column_heading != blank %}
                      <h2>{{ first_column_heading }}</h2>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if first_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ first_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 2 %}
    
                    {% if second_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ second_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if second_column_heading != blank %}
                      <h2>{{ second_column_heading }}</h2>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if second_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ second_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 3 %}
    
                    {% if third_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ third_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if third_column_heading != blank %}
                      <h2>{{ third_column_heading }}</h2>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if third_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ third_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% else %}
    
                    {% if fourth_column_image != blank %}
                      <div class="column-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        <img src="{{ fourth_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="column_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if fourth_column_heading != blank %}
                      <h2>{{ fourth_column_heading }}</h2>
                    {% endif %}
    
                    {% if fourth_column_text != blank %}
                      <p>{{ fourth_column_text }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% endif %}
                </div>

                {% if forloop.first %}
                  {% for block in section.blocks %}
                    <div class="body-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                      <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }} row-heading-{{ section.id }}">
        
                        {% if block.settings.row_heading_image != blank %}
                          <div class="row-heading-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            <img src="{{ block.settings.row_heading_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_heading_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    
                        {% if block.settings.row_heading != blank %}
                          <h2>{{ block.settings.row_heading }}</h2>
                        {% endif %}
                    
                      </div>
                      <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.first_column_image != blank %}
                          <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            <img src="{{ block.settings.first_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                          </div>
                        {% endif %}
        
                        {% if block.settings.first_column_text != blank %}
                          <p>{{ block.settings.first_column_text }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  {% endfor %}

                  {% if table_use_link %}
                    {% if first_column_link != blank %}
                      <div class="footer-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                            <a href="{{ first_column_link_url }}">{{ first_column_link }}</a>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  {% endif %}
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 2 %}
                    {% for block in section.blocks %}
                      <div class="body-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }} row-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-heading-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.row_heading_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_heading_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading != blank %}
                            <h2>{{ block.settings.row_heading }}</h2>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                        </div>
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                          {% if block.settings.second_column_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.second_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
          
                          {% if block.settings.second_column_text != blank %}
                            <p>{{ block.settings.second_column_text }}</p>
                          {% endif %}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    {% endfor %}

                    {% if table_use_link %}
                      {% if second_column_link != blank %}
                        <div class="footer-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                          <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                              <a href="{{ second_column_link_url }}">{{ second_column_link }}</a>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endif %}
                  
                  {% elsif forloop.index == 3 %}
                    {% for block in section.blocks %}
                      <div class="body-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }} row-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-heading-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.row_heading_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_heading_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading != blank %}
                            <h2>{{ block.settings.row_heading }}</h2>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                        </div>
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                          {% if block.settings.third_column_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.third_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
          
                          {% if block.settings.third_column_text != blank %}
                            <p>{{ block.settings.third_column_text }}</p>
                          {% endif %}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    {% endfor %}

                    {% if table_use_link %}
                      {% if third_column_link != blank %}
                        <div class="footer-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                          <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                              <a href="{{ third_column_link_url }}">{{ third_column_link }}</a>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endif %}

                  {% else %}
                    {% for block in section.blocks %}
                      <div class="body-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }} row-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-heading-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.row_heading_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_heading_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                          {% if block.settings.row_heading != blank %}
                            <h2>{{ block.settings.row_heading }}</h2>
                          {% endif %}
                      
                        </div>
                        <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                          {% if block.settings.fourth_column_image != blank %}
                            <div class="row-image-{{ section.id }}">
                              <img src="{{ block.settings.fourth_column_image | image_url: width: 800 }}" alt="row_image-{{ forloop.index }}">
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
          
                          {% if block.settings.fourth_column_text != blank %}
                            <p>{{ block.settings.fourth_column_text }}</p>
                          {% endif %}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    {% endfor %}

                    {% if table_use_link %}
                      {% if fourth_column_link != blank %}
                        <div class="footer-table-items-{{ section.id }}">
                          <div class="table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                              <a href="{{ fourth_column_link_url }}">{{ fourth_column_link }}</a>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endif %}
                {% endif %}              
              </div>
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
          {% if slider_arrows_use %}
            <div class="comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512"><path d="M233.4 406.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l192-192c12.5-12.5 12.5-32.8 0-45.3s-32.8-12.5-45.3 0L256 338.7 86.6 169.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0s-12.5 32.8 0 45.3l192 192z"/></svg>
            </div>
            <div class="comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512"><path d="M233.4 406.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l192-192c12.5-12.5 12.5-32.8 0-45.3s-32.8-12.5-45.3 0L256 338.7 86.6 169.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0s-12.5 32.8 0 45.3l192 192z"/></svg>
            </div>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
                            
  </div>
</div> 

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script>
  function init() {
    const sliders = document.querySelectorAll('.comparison-slider-{{ section.id }}');
    if(sliders) {
      sliders.forEach(item => {
        const slider = new Swiper(item, {
          speed: 800,
          spaceBetween: 20,
          navigation: {
            nextEl: '.comparison-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
            prevEl: '.comparison-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
          }
        });
      })
    }
  }
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', init);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', init);
  }
</script>
